NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Film Festivals or Music Concerts?

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Theater Performances or Comedy Shows?
NC.A: {Theater Performances} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.
